item.title: Best practices for hook projects
item.description: Best practices for hook projects Click here to give feedback about this page About This Page Is this a new page?: Existing doc: no changes needed to fit the new IA Target personas: Internal application builders, Saas Builder Changes to be made: Update title Links to original docs: https://developer.okta.com/docs/reference/hooks-best-practices/ Page type: Concept Content type: Best practice A Best Practices document presents a set of best practices to the reader. They may pertain to design, coding, or administrative tasks but do not often include actual step-by-step instructions.
